name: Poodle io (opoly)
description:
Poodle io is a tail-waggingly fun Board Game! It's a playful celebration of our wonderful canine friends! Travel the Poodle io board as you collect and trade different poodles & properties. Play a fun strategic opoly-style board game while celebrating the Poodle breed of dogs.

Optional Game Features:

* 2D/2.5D/3D play modes
* Customize your player cards
* Change player names
* Increase or decrease the amount of money played in the game
